kitchen.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

go east.message: You climb back out through the window.

east.message: You climb back out through the window.

actions.examine table: There's nothing special about the kitchen table.

living room.description: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.

actions.examine rug: The rug is handwoven, and artistically done. There might be something under it.

look under rug.message: Under the rug is a closed trap door.

move rug.message: Moving the rug reveals a trap door.

open trapdoor.message: The door reluctantly opens to reveal a rickety staircase descending into darkness.

go down.message: You descend the rickety staircase into darkness.

attic.description: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down.
